Imran Ahmed

UMW Senior Student // Computer Science Major // Business Administration Minor // Bengali // Swiss

********************About Myself*********************

My name is Imran Ahmed. I'm a senior, majoring in Computer Science and minoring in Business Administration at the Univerisity of Mary Washington. I am orginially from Bangladesh, although I was born in Geneva, Switzerland. I can speak three different languages: English, Bangla, and French.

So far throughout my own time and my undergraduate career, I have acquired theses following skills: C++, Java, Bootstrap, PostgresSQL, SQL, HTML5, CSS3, AngularJS, JavaScript, SocketIO, Python, and Unix.

After living my first three years in Switzerland, I moved to Southern California and lived there for about a year. After living in Southern California for about a year, my family and I moved to Fairfax, Virginia and then moved to South Riding, VA. I grew up mostly in South Riding, Virginia as a Bengali-Swiss-American. Growing up in South Riding, VA was tough because with all the moving and not being there close with my relatives who live in Switzerland. The thing I did was just talk with the friends I eventually made and played video games a lot-which I played a lot of video games.

As I grew older, I fell in love with the game of basketball. I was so in love with basketball that I decided to coach 5 years of it (1 year as assistant coach and 4 years as head coach). The four years I was a head coach, we made it to the playoffs every year as one of the top teams in the league and won the championships twice. For coaching basketball for 5 years, I have earned a total of 250 volunteer hours. I still play basketball since I was in second grade. Plus I'm a huge Boston fan but I'm mostly a huge Boston Celtics fan since I started watching basketball when I was in 2nd grade. I love to play my guitar in my free time, stay in shape, watch basketball (especially Boston Celtics basketball) in my free time, and love spending time with my family and relatives.

Experience

Web Development Intern at AMPCUS Inc.

Practice hard coding in HTML5 and CSS3 websites for AMPCUS, researched material content for websites, writing and editing content, designing webpage layout, updating websites, creating back up files, and debugging problems.

May 2015 - August 2015

University of Mary Washington

Majoring in Computer Science and minoring in Business Administration. Been nominated onto the Dean's List: Fall 2015 and Spring 2016. Currently involved in several groups: UMW Basketball Club, UNICEF club and ISA club.

August 2014 - Current

Freedom High School

Earned my high school diploma. Involved in several groups: TSA, Key club, Chess club, and CAMPUS. Received three awards: Volunteer Letter (Earned due to 250 volunteer hours) and True Eagle (two times)

August 2010 - June 2014

Retail Sales Associate at JCPenney

Provided customer service to patron, stocking and organizing product on the sales floor, greeting customers, assisting guests with finding the right merchandise, ringing up purchases, and handling returns

September 2012 - May 2014

Volunteer at Mercer-Lunsford Basketball League

Created offensive and defensive strategies, designed plays and practiced those plays in practice, assigned positions to players, managed when practice will be held, directed schedule of what was coming up next in schedule, emailed parents/players about important reminders and tips for upcoming games, and worked with players individually if those players needed more help.

December 2009 - March 2014
